explains: adv. 盲目地；轻率地；摸索地

sentences.en: Don't just blindly follow what the banker says.
sentences.cn: 不要盲目地听从这位银行家的话。

sentences.en: She groped blindly for the light switch in the dark room.
sentences.cn: 她在黑暗的房间里摸索电灯开关。

sentences.en: Without adequate information, many students choose a college almost blindly.
sentences.cn: 由于没有足够的信息，很多学生几乎都是盲目地选择大学。
